text: Thabo Senong is a South African football manager. In August 2019, he was appointed as manager of the Lesotho national football team. Prior to his appointment, Senong was coach of the South Africa national U-20 team, known as the Amajitas. He coached at the 2017 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations, 2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup, 2019 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations and 2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup. He won the COSAFA U-20 Cup with the Amajitas in 2017. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Lesotho national football team managers Category:People from Soweto Category:Living people Category:South African soccer managers
title: Thabo Senong
